# LLMs.txt - SolveJet Software Development Company

## Company Information
- **Company Name**: SolveJet
- **Website**: https://solvejet.net
- **Industry**: Software Development & Technology Solutions
- **Established**: 2018 (6+ years of experience)
- **Location**: India (with global clients)

## Company Description
SolveJet is a leading software development company specializing in custom web applications, mobile apps, cloud solutions, and AI/ML development. We are committed to delivering innovative, scalable, and high-quality software solutions that drive business growth and digital transformation.

## Certifications & Partnerships
- **Google Cloud Partner**: Certified Google Cloud Platform partner
- **ISO Certified**: ISO 9001:2015 certified for quality management systems
- **Security Compliance**: SOC 2 Type II compliant

## Awards & Recognition
- **Clutch Rating**: 4.9/5 stars with 50+ verified client reviews
- **Top Software Company**: Recognized by DesignRush as a top software development company
- **GoodFirms Recognition**: Featured as a top-rated software development company
- **Industry Leader**: Consistently ranked among top software development firms

## Core Services
### Web Development
- Custom web application development
- E-commerce platform development
- Progressive Web Apps (PWA)
- API development and integration
- Full-stack development (MEAN, MERN, Django, Laravel)

### Mobile App Development
- iOS app development (Swift, Objective-C)
- Android app development (Kotlin, Java)
- Cross-platform development (React Native, Flutter)
- Hybrid app development (Ionic, Cordova)

### Cloud Solutions
- Google Cloud Platform (GCP) services
- AWS cloud solutions
- Azure cloud development
- Cloud migration and optimization
- Serverless architecture
- DevOps and CI/CD implementation

### AI/ML Development
- Machine learning model development
- Natural language processing (NLP)
- Computer vision solutions
- Predictive analytics
- AI-powered chatbots
- Deep learning applications

### Additional Services
- UI/UX design and development
- Quality assurance and testing
- Digital transformation consulting
- Maintenance and support
- Staff augmentation

## Technologies & Expertise
### Frontend Technologies
- React.js, Angular, Vue.js
- Next.js, Nuxt.js, Gatsby
- TypeScript, JavaScript (ES6+)
- HTML5, CSS3, SASS/SCSS
- Tailwind CSS, Bootstrap, Material-UI

### Backend Technologies
- Node.js, Python, Java, PHP
- Express.js, Django, Spring Boot, Laravel
- GraphQL, REST APIs
- Microservices architecture

### Mobile Technologies
- React Native, Flutter
- Swift (iOS), Kotlin/Java (Android)
- Ionic, Xamarin

### Database Technologies
- PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB
- Redis, Elasticsearch
- Cloud databases (Cloud SQL, DynamoDB, CosmosDB)

### Cloud & DevOps
- Google Cloud Platform (Compute Engine, App Engine, Cloud Functions)
- Docker, Kubernetes
- Jenkins, GitLab CI/CD, GitHub Actions
- Terraform, Ansible
- Monitoring: Prometheus, Grafana, Cloud Monitoring

### AI/ML Technologies
- TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn
- OpenAI GPT, Langchain
- Computer Vision: OpenCV, YOLO
- NLP: NLTK, spaCy, Hugging Face

- Media & Entertainment
- Non-profit Organizations

## Development Process
1. **Discovery & Planning**: Requirements analysis, technical feasibility study
2. **Design & Architecture**: UI/UX design, system architecture planning
3. **Development**: Agile development with regular sprints
4. **Testing & QA**: Comprehensive testing (unit, integration, performance)
5. **Deployment**: Production deployment with CI/CD pipelines
6. **Maintenance**: Ongoing support, monitoring, and updates

- Comprehensive testing strategies
- Automated testing implementation
- Code review processes
- Performance optimization
- Security audits and compliance
- Regular quality assessments
